attributes.action: Drug test all MPs and the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Prolonged use of substances effect a persons judgement, therefore it is imperative that those in positions of power, especially those dealing with wars, are not under the influence of any illegal substances.
attributes.background: Leaders lead by example. Therefore, drug taking is not acceptable. Random drug testing needs to be implemented immediately. If found guilty they should face the law like anyone else.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce random alcohol & drug testing within the House of Commons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714495
